mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into member (`name`, department_id, `location`, native_place, sex, nation, join_time, remarks, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, enabled) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update member set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `location` = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, join_time = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, department_id, `location`, native_place, sex, nation, join_time, remarks, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, enabled from member where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
